text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At summer camp, Manhattan Cafe is<n>exerting herself
something fierce.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Phew...
choice_data_list: Good work. Let's call it a night.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Under...stood. Thank you for today.<n>But, um...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Have I improved... this summer?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Okay... Well in that case... there's<n>something I'd like you to
do for me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It's very... important.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Manhattan Cafe asked me to come<n>watch her race tonight.
When I reach<n>the meeting place, I notice that she is<n>alone.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Thank you for coming... Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Everything has... led to tonight. I need<n>you... to see this.
choice_data_list: Will you be racing your friend?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No, not her. The truth is...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: The other one... is here. Right... behind<n>you...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Don't turn around. It's... after you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
As long as it can see me... you are<n>safe. It may try to draw
you away...<n>however...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I don't know. But...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I won't let it happen.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I'm going to beat it tonight... and put<n>an end to this. Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Do you believe me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I swallow hard. I have no idea what<n>will happen if she loses,
but I know<n>that there is only one answer to the<n>question at
hand.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Thank you... Shall we get going?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
The rules are simple. We'll run to that<n>big rock, and then
back. The first one<n>to reach you again is the winner.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It's fast... But...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I won't lose. I've also... gotten faster.<n>And it's all thanks to
your guidance...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I'm ready. Can you give us the<n>signal?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I nod and take a step back, then raise<n>my arm to give the
starting signal.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She takes a deep breath, then dashes<n>off into the night. Her
silhouette melts<n>into the murky darkness, just as I<n>have
witnessed many times before.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I see only her shadow, yet strangely,<n>I think I see another
set of footprints<n>behind hers, as if someone is giving<n>
chase.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can see the sand being kicked up<n>behind them, and it
indicates that they<n>are about neck-and-neck. Cafe leads<n>
barely, a fierce look emblazoned<n>across her visage.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(You really are... fast. You've<n>always... wanted to run like
this,<n>haven't you?)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(To run like this... To get faster... But<n>you couldn't tell
anyone... because no<n>one can see you...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (Oh! So that's why... you needed my<n>trainer...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (If anyone, Trainer would certainly<n>believe in you...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You won't be able to see her... No one<n>can, no matter how
hard they look...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I'm the only one... who ever notices<n>her. She... she remains
far away, even<n>from me...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I was sure... that you couldn't see<n>her. But it really feels
like... you can...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (You wanted... to be noticed... Noticed<n>by Trainer... But...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A sudden strong wind kicks up the<n>sand, blocking my view.
The runners<n>should be arriving at my position any<n>moment
now, but I can't see a thing.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I won't let you... take Trainer away!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Hraaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Suddenly, and as though it was a<n>figment of my imagination,
the wind<n>storm subsides, and the beach is<n>calm once
more.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It... no, she... has gone. Probablybecause... she was able to do whatshe'd always wanted...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: And that was... to run like everyone<n>else.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Like everyone at the academy... To<n>win and lose... To get
faster and<n>stronger...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But... No one was able to<n>acknowledge her.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
If only... I had noticed sooner, then<n>she might not have gone
after you...
choice_data_list: But she must be happy now, right?
But she must be happy now, right?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I think... she is...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You're really... quite the unusual<n>person...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You... must've been scared this<n>whole time... Yet you were
able to<n>move on... like it was nothing.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: (Someone like you... is what she<n>needed... and what I...)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Oh!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
There's a shooting star... It's like<n>she's running off... into
the night...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Um... Trainer... Would it be okay if... we<n>stayed here a bit
longer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All falls silent, and Manhattan Cafe<n>and I gaze upon the
night sky for a<n>while. This has truly become an<n>
unforgettable summer camp.
